description:
Schedule (estimated):
18:45 - Arrival
19:00 - Welcome
19:10 - Ramilo Neves - Building your tests with BDD (talk in Portuguese, slides in English)
19:40 - Thiago Marcolino - Workshop: Clean. Building a tests’ suite with XUnit, AutoFixture and NSubstitute (talk in Portuguese, slides in English)
20:30 - Coffe Break & Networking

Thiago Marcolino
I have more over six years' experience in software development (Python, Java, Groovy, .Net, etc). All along of my career, I have been focusing on test driven development. Currently, I work as Senior Software Developer at Farfetch in Porto/Portugal where I have been living since December 2016.In my free time, I have been dedicating myself to my private educational project (http://classito.pro/).

Ramilo Neves
I have been working with software quality for 8 years. I have already worked with manual tests and today I work with test automation. My main skills are interface testing, API and performance testing. As a good Brazilian, I love football. I live in Portugal for 9 months.. I am passionate about the testing area, so I love attending events and exchanging ideas on the area. I currently work at Farfetch as a test automation engineer on the payment team.

website: https://portotestersmeetup.github.io/
slack: https://slackvite.com/portotestersmeetup
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/PortoTestersMeetup/
email: portotestersmeetup at gmail dot com
name: Porto Testers Meetup #2.6
